Subject: Re: Following Megatrons troops.

    Megatron began laughing, and rather hard too. So hard in fact a small 
landslide occured because of the echo. Aerostreak and Waspinator joined in 
the humor as well.
    "You stupid idiot, who do you think youre dealing with?" Megatron said, 
and snapped his arm cannon into fireing position. "I suggest you surrender, 
or die in this artic hell hole. You could be a very valuable asset to the 
Predacon team. Your large, strong, well armed, and Im assuming you must be 
somewhat intelligent to even think about trying to usurp me."
    Waspinator and Aerostreak raised thier weapons as well, armed for killing 
the imposter.
    "So, what do you say? Will you join us or will you force me and my troops 
to blow you bit by imposterous bit?" He said, raising one eye brow to the 
dragon.
